title: Error when creating a bare repository
body:
#### What is the problem?

When trying to create a new, bare  datalad  repository using

     datalad create testset --bare

the following error occurs:

     [INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /p/home/jusers/dickscheid1/judac/testset
     CommandError: command '['git', '-c', 'annex.largefiles=nothing', 'add', '--dry-run', '-N', '--ignore-missing', '--verbose', '--', '.gitattributes']' failed with exitcode 128
     Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'annex.largefiles=nothing', 'add', '--dry-run', '-N', '--ignore-missing', '--verbose', '--', '.gitattributes'] under '/p/home/jusers/dickscheid1/judac/testset'. Exit code=128.     out= err=fatal: this operation must be run in a work tree

     fatal: this operation must be run in a work tree


The bare git annex repo is successfully created, but datalad seems to try to run this post-configuration which only makes sense for non-bare repos.

#### What steps will reproduce the problem?

see above

#### What version of DataLad are you using (run `datalad --version`)? On what operating system (consider running `datalad wtf`)?

datalad 0.12.0rc6
on Jülich's JUDAC system:
